Encoders Notes
I made a small avs script to crop, resize & smoothen it.
I then dropped that into vdubmod.
There i lowered the brightness,
increased the contrast, saturation & gamma.
Then i changed the colors with a rgb eq & sharpened it.
Finaly i re-encoded the audio & muxed it to my encode.
Its a bit blurry but thats because i used a smoother
to remove the noise as normal de-noiser's werent working.
Download the sample first to check that your happy with the quality.
Next up is the rite ppvrip.
Enjoy the film...


I am looking for;
Cammers, Cams, Screeners (any type), Cam audio, Line audio,
Un-released R6's R5's R4's R2's R1's,
A 25GB+ FTP server, A Windows Server
& a syncer.
